info.description: Quiz Sprint TMA Backend API - A Telegram Mini App for interactive quizzes
info.title: Quiz Sprint API

get.description: Get a list of all available quiz categories
Get a list of all available quizzes with basic information, optionally filtered by category.

parameters.description: Category ID to filter quizzes by
parameters.name: categoryId

get.description: Get detailed results for a quiz session including statistics and quiz info

delete.description: Delete an active quiz session, allowing the user to start fresh

401.description: Unauthorized - session belongs to another user

post.description: Submit an answer for a question in an active quiz session

200.description: Answer result with correctness, points, and next question or final result

400.description: Invalid request, session completed, or already answered

404.description: Session, question, or answer not found

get.description: Get detailed quiz information including questions, answers (without correct answer indicators), and top 3 leaderboard scores

200.description: Quiz details with questions and top scores

get.description: Retrieve the active quiz session for the current user and quiz
Get the leaderboard for a specific quiz with top scores

post.description: Create a new quiz session for a user and return the first question

201.description: Quiz session started with first question

post.description: Register a new user from Telegram Mini App or update existing user profile (idempotent). Requires valid Telegram init data in Authorization header.

get.description: Retrieve user profile by Telegram user ID

400.description: Invalid request body or user ID

get.description: Get a paginated list of all users
